column1: #text=I bought a ticket for a train ride to the city .
#text=I made sure I was at the station at least 15 minutes early so that I would not miss the train .
#text=After waiting for a few minutes , my train was ready to be boarded .
#text=I lined up with the other passengers and gave my ticket to the lady at the counter .
#text=We all boarded the train in an orderly fashion and waited until it was time to depart .
#text=It was n't too long until it was time for the train to go .
#text=I quietly sat by the window seat and looked at the great scenery outside as the train went by .
#text=I would have never seen some of the scenery had I not taken the train .
#text=Before I knew it , the train had arrived at our destination in the city .
#text=I am glad I decided to take the train this time because I enjoyed it .
